messages.zh: 我们已经接近切城中城区了。
messages.tl: We are already close to the cut city Midtown.

messages.zh: ......灾云越聚越浓......短程通讯也被灾云干扰了吗......
messages.tl: ...the disaster cloud is getting more and more concentrated... Is short-range communication also disturbed by the disaster cloud...

messages.zh: ——灾云现象足以干扰电波时，天灾发生在即！我们必须立刻撤出切城......！
messages.tl: —— When the cloud phenomenon is enough to interfere with the radio wave, the natural disaster occurs! We must withdraw from the city immediately...!

messages.zh: 但我们可能......很难逃得掉了。
messages.tl: But we may... hard to escape.
